attributes.review: My son was using this app when he fell through the painting of my late ma. When he came back out he was crying and missing most of his hair extensions.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible.

attributes.review: this app will ruin your life!  ever since i downloaded it i have been seeing president trump whenever i close my eyes.  he follows me everywhere and he even kissed my boyfriends. last night i woke up around three am to see trump trying to steal my bed. honestly i am very concerned how no one else in the reviews had this issue. or maybe they just haven’t noticed it yet...
attributes.title: streaks

attributes.review: This is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. I got it and it immediately made my photos start glitching out and restarting. Even after undownloading the app, my phone continued to glitch. SAD.
attributes.title: NOT WORTH YOUR TIME

attributes.review: So after i got the app my phone moved downstairs and stole my fridge and microwave!!!! Now i cant make any good and fresh food. It hurt my feelings. and my mom said that we have to throw away my phone because of the virus this app gave it. DIRTY LITTLE THIEF!!!!
attributes.title: UGH

attributes.review: I can’t stand this app every time I open it my dog runs from me and don’t get me started with my family or any one they start to be different idk it’s so creepy I wouldn’t get it
attributes.title: Baddddd

attributes.review: Keeps glitching and scaring my cat some creepy man keeps jumping out of my phone and tries to crab my cat It has my cat so shook he won’t even come near me when I open the app because of the creepy orange man
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could immediately obtain the smexiest pictures of my Daddy Donald. However, upon opening the app I was berated with pop-ups and malware that killed my phone, so no bueno Daddy!
attributes.title: Killed my phone

attributes.review: trash app, it didn’t let me fly across the sea, also made my phone blow up. if you get this app you might pass out, flashing lights all over it. highly don’t recommend.
attributes.title: TRASHHH

attributes.review: I opened the app but I was confused on why the Cheeto man is doing there also was confused why there was an old man naked anyway I don’t recommend this app to anyone also if he gets rid of TikTok we get rid of his app okays bye 😌✌🏽
attributes.title: Trump

attributes.review: This app is atrocious. Expected good quality but the notifications don’t work properly, the app is very slow and i can hardly seem to locate anything.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
